Text: Thanks for the great uploads! I've been downloading Episodes 1 to 3 and have a question. What encoding do they use? I am having trouble playing them. Either the video plays way too fast (the audio is perfect, though!) or it plays "jumpy". I never had any trouble with other downloads but maybe I am missing a codec? Thanks for your info! ;-)
I used XviD MPEG-4 codec. It works fine with VLC player too (www.videolan.org); it's got all codecs integrated.

Thanks a lot!
Great great great!
Can someone PLE-e-e-e-ase seed part 5, just for a minute. I am stuck at 99.9% with 512kB to go. Thank you.
